ai-iti55:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti55:2.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-iti55:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti55:3.1_0: “The search for sensual pleasures, for a good rebirth,
ai-iti55:3.2_0: and the search for a spiritual path;
ai-iti55:4.1_0: for one detached from all lusts,
ai-iti55:4.2_0: freed by the ending of craving,
ai-iti55:4.5_0: With the ending of searches, a mendicant
ai-iti55:4.6_0: is free of hope and indecision.”
ai-iti55:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti55:5.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
